## file.read() function

Read utf-8 file and transform to standard new lines.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function read(path: string): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path of the file to read |
